mapper.select: SELECT U_COMMUNITY_POST_ID, U_ID, POST_TYPE_ID, U_COMMUNITY_IMG_ID, U_COMMUNITY_CONTENT, U_COMMUNITY_DATE_CREATED, COMMUNITY_LIKE_CNT, COMMUNITY_CUM_CNT FROM (SELECT SEQ, U_COMMUNITY_POST_ID, U_ID, POST_TYPE_ID, U_COMMUNITY_IMG_ID, U_COMMUNITY_CONTENT, U_COMMUNITY_DATE_CREATED, COMMUNITY_LIKE_CNT, COMMUNITY_CUM_CNT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS SEQ, U_COMMUNITY_POST_ID, U_ID, POST_TYPE_ID, U_COMMUNITY_IMG_ID, U_COMMUNITY_CONTENT, U_COMMUNITY_DATE_CREATED, COMMUNITY_LIKE_CNT, COMMUNITY_CUM_CNT FROM (SELECT U_COMMUNITY_POST_ID, U_ID, POST_TYPE_ID, U_COMMUNITY_IMG_ID, U_COMMUNITY_CONTENT, U_COMMUNITY_DATE_CREATED, COMMUNITY_LIKE_CNT, COMMUNITY_CUM_CNT FROM MEMBER_COMMUNITY ORDER BY U_COMMUNITY_POST_ID DESC) ) WHERE seq >= #{startPostNo} ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endPostNo}

SELECT C.U_COMMUNITY_POST_ID, C.U_ID, C.POST_TYPE_ID, C.U_COMMUNITY_IMG_ID, C.U_COMMUNITY_CONTENT, C.U_COMMUNITY_DATE_CREATED, C.COMMUNITY_LIKE_CNT, C.COMMUNITY_CUM_CNT FROM MEMBER_COMMUNITY C INNER JOIN community_post_img I ON C.U_COMMUNITY_IMG_ID = I.COMMUNITY_IMG_ID WHERE C.U_COMMUNITY_POST_ID=#{communityPostId}
